dict.acceptation: 维持，保持；保养，保管；维护；维修；

sent.orig: So utility administration, maintenance and ot IT related jobs have to remain intact.
sent.trans: 所以公用事业管制、MAIntenance和更多有联系有联系任务因该不会受阻碍。

sent.orig: Maintenance convenience: by ordinary means maintenance can save maintenance costs.
sent.trans: 保养方便：按普通方式保养即可，节省维护成本。

sent.orig: A qualify FAA Maintenance Repairer, the repairer of Aircraft Maintenance, Airlines, the repairer of engine Maintenance.
sent.trans: FAA的合格飞机修护人员，工场修护人员，发动机修护人员。

sent.orig: Maintenance and operation of that maintenance, in service of machinery, equipment maintenance, inspection, repair operation.
sent.trans: 维修性操作即维修，对在役机械、设备进行维修、检查、修理的操作。

sent.orig: The maintainability of large pump unit influences the maintenance time, maintenance expense, and maintenance quality directly.
sent.trans: 大型水泵机组的维修性直接影响维修时间、维修质量和维修费用。
